TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Lemiyau, title = Lemiyau, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lemiyau} }

S.FORM: Lemiyau Itiniay i Shizi Cen no Pingtung ko Lemiyau a niyaro', 59 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 146 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 136 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 90%, Rukai 1%, roma 3%.

Lemiyao Itiniay i Shizi Cen no Pingtong ko Lemiyao a niyaro', 59 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 146 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 136 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 10 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 90%, Rokai 1%, roma 3%.
